Name: Speak to the writer of the note.
Description: Talk to the mysterious person that handed you the note in the crowd. The note read, "I want to confess. Meet me behind the mayor's building."
WinConditionDescription: The Player speaks to the note writer.

Name: Talk to Marie Bornstein.
Description: Talk to Marie Bornstein at the market in the north of town.

Name: Talk to Patrick.
Description: Ask Mark about Khana and about the one you saw.
WinConditionDescription: The correct dialogue option is selected.
